amendment.description: To require a review of heads-up guidance system displays.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3499 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3499 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 3464. (consideration: CR S1801-1802) To require a review of heads-up guidance system displays.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3499 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3499 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 3464.
